author: Alex Woodward, Alex Woodward
title: 'People have to be responsible for themselves': Why five states are refusing 'lockdowns' against coronavirus
description: Without stay-at-home orders on the state or local level, 'holdouts' in rural America face threats from an outbreak and the closures of vulnerable hospitals
content:
By the time Florida's stay-at-home order kicks in on 2 April, two weeks after the arrival of thousands of spring breakers on the state's beaches, the number of identified coronavirus cases in the state climbed past 5,000.
Arizona's governor issued a stay-at-… [+13049 chars]
